positive_examples: This is an example of security escort.
The security escort demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed security escort in this context.
A typical case of security escort would involve these features.
The concept of security escort applies here.
A security operation providing protective accompaniment for personnel, vehicles, or assets during movement or transit.
negative_examples: This is an example of security patrol, not security escort.
This represents security operation in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: SecurityPatrol, or other types of SecurityOperation

definition: A protective accompaniment operation ensuring safe passage of persons or assets.
